name: Scopolamine hydrobromide
details: Paralysis agitans; TREMORS OF DISSEMINATED SCLEROSIS. Sleeplessness and nervous agitation. Dry cough in phthisis. Similar in its effects to alcohol, both recent and remote. Corresponds to the effects of strong poisons introduced into or generated within the body. Symptoms of uraemia and acute nervous exhaustion. A remedy for shock. Third and fourth Dec. Trituration. In physiological dosage 1-200 gr. Mania and chorea; insomnia.
